Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:26/569 The North Suburb,The Slums, House U.36.6-7.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393475) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393475)
